# Help Center Structure Template

## 1. Getting Started
- Account setup
- First login
- Basic navigation
- Quick start checklist

## 2. Core Workflows
- Create and manage profile
- Upload and manage documents
- Run analysis
- Review and approve suggestions

## 3. Feature Guides
For each feature, include:
1. What it does
2. When to use it
3. Step-by-step instructions
4. Common mistakes
5. Best practices
6. Troubleshooting

## 4. Responsible Use and Guardrails
- What users should not do
- Accuracy verification guidance
- Data privacy expectations
- AI-generated content limitations

## 5. Troubleshooting
- Common errors and fixes
- Network/auth issues
- Data sync issues
- Contact support process

## 6. FAQ
- Billing and subscriptions
- Data retention and deletion
- Permissions and access

## 7. Glossary
- Define domain terms and system labels.

## 8. Help Content Standards
- Task-based titles: "How to..."
- Keep steps short and numbered
- Include screenshots where useful
- Include "Expected result" after each flow
- Add last-updated date and owner
